mapper.select: select boardNo, title, writer, content, memberNo, timePosted, hit from(select board_no as boardNo, title, writer, content, member_no as memberNo, time_posted as timePosted, hit, CEIL(rownum/5) AS page from board where board_type='notice' order by board_no desc) where page=#{value}
select count(*) from board where board_type='notice'
select board_no, title, writer, content, member_no, time_posted from board where board_no=#{value}
mapper.update: update board set title=#{title}, content=#{content} where board_no=#{boardNo}
mapper.insert:
select ymv_seq.nextval from dual
insert into board(board_no, board_type, title, writer, content, member_no, time_posted) values(#{boardNo}, 'notice', #{title}, #{writer}, #{content}, 2, sysdate)
